scripts.migrate:up: NODE_PG_MIGRATE_TS_NODE=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true node -r ts-node/register ./node_modules/.bin/node-pg-migrate up --migrations-dir src/migrations --migrations-table inventory_schema_migrations
scripts.migrate:down: NODE_PG_MIGRATE_TS_NODE=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true node -r ts-node/register ./node_modules/.bin/node-pg-migrate down --migrations-dir src/migrations --migrations-table inventory_schema_migrations
scripts.db:reset:migrate: npm run db:reset && npm run migrate
